programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: Larry from Cashbrokers in Penzance goes to look at some antique petrol pumps, while in south-east London childhood sweethearts want to pawn their jewellery to fund a family reunion.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: Dan takes his sister to test drive a monster truck, Wendy comes across a handbag that could be very valuable, and Larry and Neil examine some works of art bought in a pub.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer help two couples from Gloucestershire who are looking for properties to reflect the change of direction their lives have taken. Cosmopolitan couple Mel and Jon hope to adopt a child, and are looking for a family home in the Cotswolds, while Isobel and Chris are soon to be married, and want to buy their first house together.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Paul Quentel, president of Alfred Angelo, the second largest bridal retailer in the United States, goes undercover to solve any problems as quickly as possible. Posing as a contestant on a reality TV competition, he works among his own staff.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Mike Bloom, president and COO of discount retail chain Family Dollar, intends to double its number of stores within a few years. He decides that to do so he first needs to go incognito within the organisation to monitor where the firm is excelling and where it needs improvement.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition kicks off at the Five Bells near Dover, where manager Shelley Parnell and her competitive mum Linda Yates hope their bargain-priced B&B will win the day.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Kennels owner Dean Faulkner is keen to impress as he hosts the first dinner party in Cambridge, where his guests are beauty school co-ordinator Kay Greenwood, gardening enthusiast Matt Sullivan, headstrong international development manager Hawa Sydique and the Beatles-obsessed Dave Goodier.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Beauty school co-ordinator Kay Greenwood hosts the second dinner party in Cambridge, hoping her tempura prawns and beef stroganoff will win her the £1,000 prize. One guest is sceptical about her chances of success, but changes his mind when he samples her unique entertainment.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Gardening enthusiast Matt Sullivan hosts the third dinner party in Cambridge, where his home-grown English menu of `posh' fish and chips and rice pudding surprises his guests. Rather than focusing on the cooking, he creates his own school fete and tries to wow everyone with a selection of outdoor games as he vies for the £1,000 prize.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: International development manager Hawa Sydique hosts the fourth dinner party from Cambridge, and her adventurous menu seems to cause more problems than it is worth. However, she hopes to impress with the 20-piece samba band in her living room, but the other guests are a little overwhelmed.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Beatles-loving Scouser David Goodier hosts the final dinner party in Cambridge and is determined to impress his guests with a 1960s Merseybeat dress code and courses entitled `Spicy Beatballs' and `Tir-Mersey-su'. As the evening draws to a close, the winner of the £1,000 cash prize is revealed.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer visit Hastings to help two couples look for their dream homes. However, with extravagant ideas and limited budgets on the agenda, they have their work cut out locating suitable properties. Jakki and Scott are determined to find a house before the arrival of their baby, while newlyweds Chris and Nicola want a two-bedroom family home in a great location.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Jasmine Harman helps a couple with a £250,000 budget who have decided to move full time to northern Costa Blanca, but first they must choose from five possible homes.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits a dog-friendly hotel in West Dover, Vermont, that is in urgent need of help. Owner Sandy MacDougall runs the Four Seasons Inn like a hostel, with unpaid staff staying in the rooms instead of paying guests. The acerbic chef aims to get the business back on track before Sandy loses everything, but wonders whether it would be kinder to simply put this dog-friendly hotel to sleep.(n)

programme.title: Gogglesprogs
programme.desc: Young TV viewers give their honest, inimitable and hilarious take on This Morning and Doctor Who, and sing along to The Sound of Music.(n)

programme.title: The Crystal Maze
programme.desc: Maze Master Richard Ayoade guides Andrea McLean, Spencer Matthews, Tom Allen, Stacey Solomon and Joe Swash through the Aztec, Medieval, Industrial and Futuristic zones. In each one, the contestants must conquer physical, skill, mystery and mental challenges in a bid to win crystals, which add to their time inside the Crystal Dome, where they hope to collect gold tokens to convert into cash for the Stand Up to Cancer charity.(n)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Nahida from Liverpool is searching for a man who shares her passion for food, and her date is with fellow Liverpudlian Thomas, who describes himself as a loveable bear. Ex-cruise ship worker Dale, 46, has been single for five years since his partner passed away, but is now ready to put his faith in Cupid again, and his date is 39-year-old massage therapist Chris.(n)

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: Self-proclaimed family man James looks forward to the arrival of his fifth child and Kirsty, who was the first triplet to be delivered at Liverpool Women's Hospital returns to have her own baby, hoping motherhood is the key to a more independent life. Meanwhile, an unexpected pregnancy for Jo, still living with her parents at the age of 35, means a busy retirement for first-time grandparents Jean and John.(n)

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Anna Richardson guides two more singletons on the dating show based naked attraction alone. First into the studio is 26-year-old Adele from Scotland. After beating cancer, Adele wants to live life to the full and find a guy who feels the same. She is followed by 22-year-old Jack from Manchester. After a dramatic four-stone weight-loss, Jack wants to show off his new body and attract the one for him.(n)

programme.title: World's Most Expensive Cars
programme.desc: Ant Anstead finds out how the Jaguar D-Type fared at an auction in Monterey, California. Plus, a look at a 1951 Ferrari 340 and a 1931 Stutz DV32.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts the words-and-numbers game, with Jon Richardson and Jonathan Ross taking on guest captain Lee Mack and Victoria Coren Mitchell. Jessie Cave joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner and Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters.(n)

programme.title: Bizarre ER
programme.desc: Featuring a man who was injured trying to help his wife give CPR to a goldfish, and a groom whose injury could mean that he cannot tie the knot. Narrated by Tom Davis.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Eric Casaburi, a former undercover boss, invites six other employers who also appeared incognito on the show to talk about their experiences of the programme at a restaurant. However, little do they realise that Eric is going to try to fool them by appearing as a waiter. Featuring Kat Cole, Paul Damico, Andy Wiederhorn, Sheldon Yellen, Anthony Wedo and Jane Grote Abell.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: Nathan and Debb test-drive an unusual motorcycle simulator at Pickwick Pawnbrokers, while Larry and Neil look to complete deals involving a rare drum kit, a luxury set of travel bags and an antique medicine cabinet at Cashbrokers in Penzance.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: Pickwick Pawnbrokers boss Nathan might have laid his hands on a fourth-century statue worth tens of thousands of pounds, while another customer is selling a rare grandfather clock.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer help two couples looking for somewhere to live in Buckinghamshire, where they can combine high-flying careers in the capital with peaceful small-town life for their young families. Shane and Annamarie Mugan have a budget of £850,000, but have not found their ideal home after viewing more than 50 properties, while Emma and Andrew Jarvis face tough competition as they search for a four-bedroom house with plenty of character.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA

Featuring Kat Cole, Paul Damico, Andy Wiederhorn, Sheldon Yellen, Anthony Wedo and Jane Grote Abell.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Shane Evans, COO and co-founder of massage therapy chain Massage Heights, poses as a contestant on a TV reality show who is trying fund her own business. After spending nine years moulding the company, she decides to find out first-hand how her retreats are doing so she can fix potential problems before expanding the business to 300 new locations.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The hosts check in to the Thomas Paine Hotel in Thetford, where an inappropriate book is found in a bedside drawer and competition turns fierce at a Home Guard training exercise.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Five amateur cooks from Wakefield, West Yorkshire, take turns trying to throw the perfect dinner party. Retired businesswoman Angie Battye hosts the first night and hopes her Asian roots and love of Barbadian cuisine will impress her guests. She also provides entertainment in the form of limbo dancing.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: IT expert and disco fanatic Joel Rowbottom throws the second of the week's parties in Wakefield, West Yorkshire, hoping to impress his guests with an exciting mixture of food and dance. The host faces awkward questions about his disco pants, resulting in some frank revelations, but hopes he can turn the evening's fortunes around with his `dad dancing' competition.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Donna Stephenson hopes to impress with a main course of `bunny delight' as she hosts the third dinner party from Wakefield, West Yorkshire - but her guests are distracted by the number of animals she has.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Shoeless window cleaner Jake Coxon hosts the fourth dinner party from Wakefield, West Yorkshire, hoping to impress his guests with beef Wellington, and performing his song God Is a Rocking Chair with his band the Sourheads.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Hairdresser Francesca Saynor hosts the final dinner party in Wakefield, hoping that her simple menu and back-to-school theme will be enough to impress her guests and make her the winner of the £1,000 prize.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer help a couple with a budget of £480,000, who are expecting a baby in 12 weeks, find a home in Godalming, on Surrey's commuter belt, as quickly as possible. The property gurus also come to the aid of a fastidious pair in Guildford who are struggling to find a home for £250,000, jeopardising their marriage plans in the process.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Karen and John Leonard from Essex are close to retirement and fancy a new home in sunny Gran Canaria. Scarlette Douglas shows them five properties for their £175,000 budget.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer visit Hastings to help two couples look for their dream homes. Jakki and Scott are determined to find a house before the arrival of their baby, while newlyweds Chris and Nicola want a two-bedroom family home in a great location.(n)

programme.title: Who Wants My Council House
programme.desc: Documentary following five households looking to swap their council house. Some want to upgrade to their ideal home, others simply fancy a change of scenery and some are parents seeking to downsize now that their children have flown the nest. However, council house swaps do not involve estate agents with sharp sales patter. It is up to the tenants to show each other around their homes and do the hard sell. If the first viewing goes well, there will be an invitation for a return viewing before both sides decide whether to swap - or not.(n)

programme.title: Britain's Benefit Tenants
programme.desc: Documentary following the work of specialist letting agencies. Manchester agent Joe is caught between a single mother struggling to pay off her rent arrears and a landlord who has run out of patience. But unknown to Joe, his tenant has a plan to get herself out of this mess she has found herself in. Across town, letting agent Tracy is in for a shock when she discovers one of her tenants has turned a bedroom into an aviary full of tropical birds.(n)

programme.title: 999: What's Your Emergency
programme.desc: People who risk ruining their own lives for the sake of a night out, including a professional footballer almost triple the legal drink drive limit while on his way to training after drinking heavily the night before. In Crewe, PCs Vicky Howell and Greg Greaves get an eyeful on their Saturday night patrol as they stop a man walking along a main road, naked from the waist down. He doesn't know where his trousers are and it's down to the police to make sure he gets home safely.(n)

programme.title: Benefits Britain: Life on the Dole
programme.desc: This edition of the programme focuses on large families who depend on the benefits system, including 64-year-old Peter Rolfe, whose children - by 15 different women - range in ages from three to 43, of which he is the sole carer for six. He has been fighting his council in the Isle of Wight for a much bigger house and is also at loggerheads with the benefits office for capping his weekly payment. West Midlands mother-of-eight Marie Buchanan has recently split from her partner and is looking for a larger home, while Ipswich couple the Fisks have been in dispute with their neighbours, who objected to two houses being knocked into one to accommodate them and their 13 children.(n)

programme.title: Wentworth Prison
programme.desc: Franky and Allie get some outside help with their escape plans, Will is determined to expose Jake's drug-smuggling operation, and the net closes in around Liz.(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Butters starts acting out at school, prompting his parents to send him to a different country in a bid to improve his behaviour.(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Randy believes he has found the bargain of the century when he buys a video rental store for $10,000, but all is not as it seems at the isolated shop.(n)

programme.title: To Be or Not to Be
programme.desc: A very funny remake of Ernst Lubitsch's classic 1942 black comedy about actors who turn spies in World War II Warsaw. A theatre troupe are unwittingly embroiled in the Polish Resistance via a young freedom fighter who is carrying on an affair with the leading lady(n)

programme.title: Say Anything...
programme.desc: A beautiful and brilliant high school student finds herself pursued romantically by a charming but totally unambitious fellow student(n)

programme.title: Swept Away

programme.title: I Love You, Man
programme.desc: On the verge of getting married, real estate agent Peter Klaven realises he doesn't have any close pals. Setting out to find a best man, he befriends amiable slacker Sydney Fife, but spends so much time with his new buddy that the wedding is put in jeopardy(n)

programme.title: The Wash
programme.desc: Sean is financially strapped and on the verge of losing his home and his car until his roommate Dee Loc suggests he joins him as an employee at the local car wash. Tension mounts between the pals when the establishment's eccentric owner Mr. Washington promotes the more mature and responsible Sean over Dee Loc. However, when their boss is kidnapped, Sean and Dee Loc must work together to save their employer, their jobs, and their friendship(n)

programme.title: Run Fatboy Run
programme.desc: David Schwimmer's debut directorial feature stars Simon Pegg as Dennis Doyle, seen in the film's opening sequence abandoning a very pregnant Libby Odell at the altar. Five years later, he's an overweight security guard with limited access rights to their son Jake, but still holding a torch for her. When he finds she has a new boyfriend, superfit all-round jock Whit, he decides to win her back by entering the same charity marathon as Whit and beating him. With coaching from his landlord and encouragement of sorts from his friend Gordon, he sets off over the start line, but has he prepared enough to make it to the finish?(n)

programme.title: Coyote Ugly
programme.desc: Romantic comedy in which a shy songwriter moves to New York and finds love and the stardom she is seeking while working in the wild nightspot Coyote Ugly. As she attempts to get her music career off the ground, she works as a bartender, but the raucous behaviour of her colleagues - who dance on the counter while flirting outrageously with the clientele and downing copious amounts of alcohol - soon puts her relationship at risk(n)

programme.title: Marauders
programme.desc: Following a brutal bank robbery, the bank owner and his clients became FBI's prime suspects. However, further investigations into the series of heists uncover a deeper conspiracy(n)

programme.title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
programme.desc: Hellboy isn't about to stand idly by as the planet is purged by a demonic despot, and with a little help from his team at the Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defence, he may just be able to send our otherworldly overlords packing(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A brilliant scientist builds a device that allows users to teleport to an alternate dimension, but an experiment involving it goes wrong and leaves him and his three teammates with unusual superpowers. The quartet are then forced to work together to battle an enemy from their past(n)

programme.title: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
programme.desc: In this second film starring Austin Powers (Mike Myers) -the most indiscreet secret agent on the planet-, the diabolical Dr. Evil (also Myers) once again puts his evil plans into action: using a time machine, he travels back to the year 1969 and steals Austin's mojo (sex appeal). Without his mojo, the agent will not be strong enough to prevent the villain from firing a laser on the Earth. Although disheartened, Austin also travels in time and discovers that the criminal now has new allies -such as the dwarf clone, Mini-Mim (Verne Troyer) and the repugnant Igor Dan (once again, Myers). With the help of the beautiful agent, Felicity Fasobem (Heather Graham), Austin must strive to defeat the enemy and recover his vitality. The film features special performances by Woody Harrelson and musicians Willie Nelson and Elvis Costello(n)

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: A sexy thriller about divers who find themselves battling sharks and ruthless criminals after discovering hidden treasure and a crashed plane loaded with cocaine(n)

programme.title: The Rookie
programme.desc: Nick Pulovski is a cop, presently assigned to the auto theft division. When he discovers that a man named Strom is the brains behind a major car theft and chop shop ring, he sees this as his opportunity to do something big. After his partner is killed, the case is then transferred to homicide, so he is taken off the case. And he is assigned a new partner, a cop who would prefer to play by the rules(n)

programme.title: Dark Water
programme.desc: Directed by Walter Salles Jr., this remake of Hideo Nakata's supernatural psychological drama Honogurai Mizuno Soko Kara revolves around the plight of a single mother (Jennifer Connelly) whose messy divorce and subsequent battle for the custody of her five-year-old daughter is taking a heavy toll on her emotional well-being. Ultimately, the mother and daughter are able to relocate to an apartment, which, despite its excessively dilapidated interior, seems to be an adequate location for beginning a new life. Before long, however, what appears to be the spirit of a young girl begins to haunt them. No stranger to mental illness, the wary young woman brushes the visions aside as part of the inherent stress of making the transition from housewife to working, single mom. As time goes by and the apparent haunting does not subside, the apartment's new residents are forced to examine the history of its former tenants. Dark Water also features performances from John C. Reilly, Tim Roth, and Dougray Scott(n)

programme.title: Diner
programme.desc: Barry Levinson's masterly tribute to his youthful years in Baltimore is an early showcase for future stars; Kevin Bacon, Mickey Rourke and Ellen Barkin(n)

programme.title: How to Be Single
programme.desc: Four women with vastly different ideas about love and relationships navigate the single life of New York City. Taking a break from her long-term boyfriend Josh (Nicholas Braun), Alice (Dakota Johnson) sets out on a journey of self-discovery with her hard-drinking new friend Robin (Rebel Wilson). Meanwhile, Alice's career-driven older sister Meg (Leslie Mann) struggles with the idea of settling down, and uptight romantic Lucy (Alison Brie) searches for her perfect match. Adapted from former Sex and the City writer Liz Tuccillo's debut novel, this modern rom com was directed by Christian Ditter(n)

programme.title: Man on the Moon
programme.desc: Andy Kaufman's public image changed like the weather: he was loved and hated in equal measure and his innovative style of humour was often misunderstood. He acknowledged that he didn't know what was funny or not, and his material could generate laughs and tears, silence and brawls(n)

programme.title: Michael Clayton
programme.desc: George Clooney is superb in this intelligent and complex character study of a burned-out "fixer" at a powerful corporate law firm in New York City who faces a crisis of conscience as he comes to grips with his amoral actions. Written and directed by Tony Gilroy(n)

programme.title: Tetro
programme.desc: On the heels of the self-financed, modestly budgeted 2007 drama Youth Without Youth -- his first directorial outing after a ten-year hiatus -- filmmaker Francis Ford Coppola remains situated in the director's chair for this semi-autobiographical family drama concerning an artistic family of immigrants whose fierce rivalries span several generations. Vincent Gallo stars with newcomer Alden Ehrenreich, with Carmen Maura, Maribel Verdú, and Alden Ehrenreich rounding out the cast(n)

programme.title: Bachelor Party
programme.desc: Easygoing bus driver Rick is ready to get hitched to wealthy Debbie. But his pals won't let him get away without the messiest stag night of the decade(n)

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber
programme.desc: Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels star as Lloyd and Harry, two friends who must overcome their complete stupidity, and the attentions of smarter criminals, to return a bag of cash to its rightful owner(n)

programme.title: High Anxiety
programme.desc: A renowned Harvard psychiatrist (with a concealed fear of heights) takes over as director of the PsychoNeurotic Institute for the Very, Very Nervous after the last administrator dies under suspicious circumstances. Mel Brooks directed, co-wrote and plays the head shrink in this homage to Alfred Hitchcock films(n)

programme.title: Lights Out
programme.desc: A young woman (Teresa Palmer) must protect her brother (Gabriel Bateman) from a terrifying apparition that only manifests in total darkness. Later, she realizes that this fearsome entity is connected to her mentally ill mother (Maria Bello), who has started hallucinating conversations with a mysterious figure named Diana. Billy Burke and Alexander DiPersia co-star. Produced by James Wan (The Conjuring), Lights Out is a feature-length expansion of director David F. Sandberg's short film of the same name, which became a viral sensation online(n)

programme.title: Hardball
programme.desc: Television actor-turned-director Brian Robbins follows up Varsity Blues (1999) and Ready to Rumble (2000) with another sports comedy. Keanu Reeves stars as Conor O'Neill, an underachiever and inveterate sports gambler who needs a bailout loan from a friend to pay off his mounting debt. As a condition for receiving the necessary funds, Conor is saddled with coaching a corporate-sponsored Little League baseball team for underprivileged youth in Chicago's notorious Cabrini Green housing project. Reluctant at first, Conor slowly begins to enjoy his new authority role, especially when he makes the acquaintance of his players' attractive teacher, Elizabeth Wilkes (Diane Lane). Based on the real-life chronicle Hardball: A Season in the Projects by Outside magazine editor Daniel Coyle, Hardball also stars D.B. Sweeney and Mike McGlone(n)

programme.title: All the President's Men
programme.desc: Reporters Bob Woodward and Carl Bernstein uncover the details of the Watergate scandal that leads to President Nixon's resignation(n)

programme.title: Die Hard With a Vengeance
programme.desc: Things aren't going well for John McClane: his marriage is breaking up, he's been suspended from the force and now the brother of Hans Gruber, the German terrorist he threw off a building a few years back, is threatening to blow up a school if McClane doesn't run around the city solving his demeaning and dangerous puzzles. With the help of Zeus, a Harlem electrician, McClane discovers Gruber's plot to distract the NYPD while he clears the federal bank of billions of dollars of gold(n)

programme.desc: While Beckett and the author try to unravel an apparently confused woman's detailed and convincing confession to a murder, further people come forward professing their guilt of the same crime. American crime drama, starring Nathan Fillion and Stana Katic.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The discovery of a woman's body in the East River leads Briscoe and Green to investigate the drug-addicted brother of a famous footballer - and as the case unfolds, it becomes clear she may not have been the killer's only victim. Crime drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green think they have got their man when the prime suspect in a murder investigation knows every detail about the killing. However, when he claims he acquired his information from a psychic vision, the detectives have their work cut out. Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin star.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Teacher Evan Westcott shoots at senatorial candidate Grant Hamilton during a political rally, with Lindsay being hurt in the ensuing chaos and a tragedy occurring when a boy picks up the discarded firearm. The investigators recover bullets from the crime scene and match the casings to a gun registered to Hamilton, but the politician claims it was stolen during a break-in at his home. Guest starring Neal McDonough (Desperate Housewives, Justified).(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.title: A Date to Die For
programme.desc: A recent divorcee, suffering from bipolar disorder, accepts a date with a single father. The next morning, she awakens to find her date's dead body in her bed, a knife plunged in his chest. Trying to piece together her memories of the previous night, she sets out to defend her reputation and the lives of her family by locating the killer herself. Thriller, starring Victoria Pratt.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An estate agent and two clients discover the body of Lt Com Maya Burris, a naval attache who had been working in Egypt, and her detective husband Nick arrives on the scene to demand answers. Using documents discovered on the victim's boat, Abby links her to Barry Norton, who is suspected of having sold government secrets to a Middle Eastern terrorist group known as the SRC.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Curtis uncovers evidence of police corruption that puts the DA's office into conflict with an ambitious judge, and Briscoe comes under investigation for stealing evidence from a police lockup. Crime drama, with Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A janitor is found murdered, leading the team to a schizophrenic student they discover has been part of an experimental drug programme. Though all evidence points to the youngster, it transpires that he had no motive to commit the crime and the police soon turn their attentions to a psychiatrist. Sam Waterston stars.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The team investigates the murders of attorney Mitchell Hindle and mechanical engineer Justin Vanderheyden, with both victims turning out to have been shot with the same type of bullet. Adam hacks Justin's cell phone and finds that he was supposed to meet with a venture capitalist the night before, while Hawkes discovers that he had used 3D metal printing to create a gun. Crime drama, starring Gary Sinise, Carmine Giovinazzo and Hill Harper.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Navy captain wearing a colourful costume underneath his uniform is shot and killed in a flower shop, and further investigation reveals he was leading a double life as a masked vigilante. Vance brings in Tony's ex-fiancee, journalist Wendy Miller, who claims the victim had been trying to expose a scandal, and as the team pursues the case, a real-estate scam is uncovered. Guest starring Perrey Reeves (Entourage).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Navy reservist is found dead in his home with marks around his neck, and Gibbs and the team discover he was working on a highly classified case for the department of defence. The circumstances surrounding the man's demise lead the investigators to suspect someone was secretly trying to drive him insane, bringing them into contact with Samantha Ryan, the director of a division specialising in psychological warfare. Guest starring Jamie Lee Curtis.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Part one of two. Hanna receives a call for help from a former CIA colleague, only to find the man dead in an apparent suicide. Further investigations reveal his phone call was pre-recorded, putting the team onto the trail of a conspiracy that sees Deeks and Kensi go undercover at a dog show - complete with prize poodle - to look into a breeder the victim was investigating before he died. LL Cool J, Chris O'Donnell, Daniela Ruah and Eric Christian Olsen star.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A priest asks Stabler to meet a terminally ill man who has a secret he wants to share with his estranged daughter, leading the detective to discover the patient's involvement in a series of unsolved bank robberies during the 1970s. As the investigation progresses, they find a bomb shelter containing millions of dollars and the skeleton of his former partner-in-crime. Guest starring Brian Dennehy and Paget Brewster, with Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman accuses her estranged husband of breaking into her home and raping her. As the man has no history of violence and the victim refuses to allow her daughter to answer questions, the detectives are split over where the truth lies, and Benson is concerned that Stabler's judgement is being clouded by his own divorce. Drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Sarah Porter, the new Secretary of the Navy, charges Gibbs and the team with finding terrorist group the Brotherhood of Doubt, which was responsible for killing her predecessor. She expects the group's next target to be billionaire Tomas Mendez, who spends his money trying to defeat terrorism, but whose motives may not be entirely altruistic. Meanwhile, Tony flies to Tel Aviv, where new Mossad director Orli Elbaz reveals they have a report of a possible sighting of Ziva at a kibbutz she went to as a child. Crime drama, guest starring Marina Sirtis.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A daredevil driver is decapitated while performing a stunt at a street party, bringing the festivities to a premature end. Realising the incident was murder rather than an accident, the team focuses the investigation on a bystander whose expertise with remote-controlled cars makes him a likely suspect. David Caruso, Emily Procter and Adam Rodriguez star.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A DNA assessment of a kidnapping crime scene reveals horrifying results for Natalia, who discovers her sister Anya is one of a number of missing women. Racing to track her down, the team finds a collection of photographs that may hold the key to breaking the case. Starring David Caruso, Eva La Rue and Adam Rodriguez.(n)

programme.title: Chicago PD
programme.desc: A stripper's mutilated body is found and a search of her club uncovers enough dodgy evidence for Hank to strong-arm the owner into giving up the killer. But is it the right man?.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The admissions director of an exclusive Manhattan elementary school is bludgeoned to death and Briscoe and Green initially believe she was murdered by a parent determined to have their child enrolled. However, as their investigation continues, a member of the school's staff comes under suspicion. Guest starring Roger Rees, with Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate the death of a Russian model, and when the autopsy reveals a host of old injuries they suspect long-term abuse. Further tests are made on the body, and the findings suggest medical malpractice may have been the cause, leading the detectives to track down the person responsible for her death. Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin star.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Flack spots the body of a young woman tied to a sunken boat while he is looking for a murder weapon in a pond in Central Park. The team traces a spot of blood on the ballgown she was wearing to a man she had previously dated, while a ripped-up cheque found near the scene of the crime sheds more light on the case.(n)

programme.desc: Newlywed Jade returns from her honeymoon to discover her recently widowed father has been seduced by the caregiver she hired to look after him in her absence. Thriller, starring Emmanuelle Vaugier and Jordana Largy.(n)

The action then flashes back a few days to when he and the rest of the team members were investigating the death of a petty officer on board USS Gentry, which has been undergoing repairs in dry dock. The 200th episode of the crime drama, starring Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.desc: Off-duty NYPD officer Mark Riley is killed during a robbery and the CSIs puzzle over how suspect Anthony Lombardo sustained a gunshot wound in the incident but was not in the surveillance video or noticed by witnesses. programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Chief petty officer Leland Wiley dies of a heart attack just as he is about to reveal information on elusive arms dealer Agah Bayar. The team discovers the cardiac arrest was caused by someone hacking into a computer monitoring Wiley's pacemaker and increasing his heart rate to 400bpm. Meanwhile, a probationary agent tries to impress Gibbs and win a place on his team. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, with Tamer Hassan and Matt L Jones.(n)

programme.title: NCIS

Meanwhile, Gibbs' colleagues begin to notice his attraction to his opposite number Samantha Ryan. Guest starring Jamie Lee Curtis.(n)

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Nurse Doctor. Father Mulcahy (William Christopher) generously offers to help a pretty nurse (Alexandra Stoddart) study for her medical-school entrance exams. Unfortunately, the girl responds in a manner far too affectionate for the celibate Mulcahy. Meanwhile, the rest of the camp tries to figure out how to take showers with an extremely limited water supply(n)

programme.title: The Fugitive
programme.desc: Harrison Ford stars in this adaptation of the 1960s TV series about a man who goes on the lam after he's wrongly convicted of killing his wife(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: Gangster Danny Ocean enlists the help of ten accomplices to perform a triple heist of Las Vegas Casinos during a big Lennox Lewis fight. George Clooney and Brad Pitt star (2001)(n)

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part II
programme.desc: Sequel finds Mr. Miyagi going back to his homeland of Okinawa for a reunion with the sensei's dying father, taking Daniel with him. This tearful good-bye also reopens old wounds, as a karate expert and former friend of Miyagi's named Sato has never forgiven him for a decades-old slight(n)

programme.title: The Goonies
programme.desc: Old-fashioned yarn about a band of adventurous kids who take on the might of a property developing company which plans to destroy their home to build a country club. When the children discover an old pirate map in the attic, they follow it into an underground cavern in search of lost treasure. But the old pirate who had drawn the map planted plenty of dangerous obstacles along the way. From a story by Steven Spielberg(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: When New York City suffers an outbreak of unfriendly spirits, four parapsychological researchers band together to form a ghost extermination service in this immensely popular fantasy-comedy, with plentiful gags and special effects sequences. The team must battle petty bureaucrats, Babylonian demons, and the Stay-Puf Marshmallow Man to save the city(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters II
programme.desc: Five years on from their spectacular victory over the ghoulies, the supernatural sleuths have fallen on hard times, reduced to performing at children's parties. When a medieval madman comes back to life, threatening to suck New York into a river of ectoplasm, who you gonna call?(n)

programme.title: The Express
programme.desc: Rob Brown gives a stellar performance in this winning fact-based sports biopic. He plays Syracuse University running back Ernie Davis, the first African-American to win the Heisman Trophy as the outstanding college-football player in the nation in 1961. Dennis Quaid costars as Syracuse coach Ben Schwartzwalder. Directed by Gary Fleder. The screenplay is by Charles Leavitt, who based it on the book "Ernie Davis: The Elmira Express," written by Syracuse alumnus Robert C. Gallagher(n)

programme.title: Hereafter
programme.desc: Hereafter tells the story of three people who are touched by death in different ways. George is a blue-collar American who has a special connection to the afterlife. On the other side of the world, Marie, a French journalist, has a near-death experience that shakes her reality. And when Marcus, a London schoolboy, loses the person closest to him, he desperately needs answers. Each on a path in search of the truth, their lives will intersect, forever changed by what they believe might or must exist in the hereafter(n)

programme.title: The Road Warrior
programme.desc: This brutal sci-fi action film is even more intense and exciting than its predecessor. Several years after the deaths of his wife and child, Max has become an alienated nomad, wandering an Australian outback. Max eventually joins a camp of people to fight a band of marauders(n)

programme.title: Chernobyl Diaries
programme.desc: An extreme vacation turns absolutely terrifying when a group of friends visit the Chernobyl disaster site 25 years later. Tourists and their guide become unexpectedly stranded in the town of Pripyat, located near the old facility, and realize they are being hunted. Now, the harder they try to flee, the faster their numbers dwindle until only a few are left standing to battle unspeakable evil(n)

programme.title: Halloween: Resurrection
programme.desc: Director Rick Rosenthal, who helmed the very first sequel to Halloween (1978), returns to the horror film series with this eighth entry in the long-running franchise. This time the story line returns to the Haddonfield, IL, family home of serial killer Michael Myers (Brad Loree), now the site of a contest where six college students are dared to spend the night, as their experience is broadcast live on the Internet. Their personalities and motivations are varying: Sara (Bianca Kajlich) is a shy psychology major; Jen (Katee Sackhoff) hopes to launch a broadcasting career; Rudy (Sean Patrick Thomas) is a culinary arts student; Bill (Thomas Ian Nicholas) is a womanizing law student; Jim (Luke Kirby) is a rebellious musician; and Donna (Daisy McCrackin) is a brainy skeptic. Believing that the night is nothing more than a stunt that will provide them with scholarship money, the ill-advised participants are soon shuffling off their mortal coils thanks to Michael's typically ghoulish but creative methods of homicide. In the meantime, Michael's sister, Laurie Strode (Jamie Lee Curtis), is a suicidal mute, incarcerated and hospitalized for the murder of an innocent man she wrongly believed was her brother three years earlier, but a confrontation between the combative siblings is brewing. Halloween: Resurrection (2002) co-stars rapper Busta Rhymes and supermodel Tyra Banks(n)

programme.title: Mechanic: Resurrection
programme.desc: In this high-octane action sequel, hit man Arthur Bishop is forced to come out of retirement and commit three difficult assassinations in order to rescue his kidnapped lover. The hardest part: He must make all of the killings look like accidents(n)

programme.title: The Signal
programme.desc: Three students seek a notorious hacker in the Nevada desert, and end up imprisoned in a high-tech government-research facility(n)

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: A man sets out to steal a lost fortune in order to save it in this adventure drama from producer Jerry Bruckheimer. Benjamin Franklin Gates (Nicolas Cage) is an archeologist who is from the eighth generation of a family who has shared an unusual quest. As Gates-family legend has it, George Washington, Thomas Jefferson, and Benjamin Franklin hid a massive cache of gold during the waning days of the Revolutionary War and left clues as to its whereabouts in the original drafts of the Constitution and the Declaration of Independence. With no firm proof that it actually exists, Gates sets out to crack the code that will lead him to the fortune, which, as a member of the Gates clan, he is sworn to protect from wrongdoers. National Treasure also features Sean Bean, Harvey Keitel, Justin Bartha, and Jon Voight(n)

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: Lone Survivor director Peter Berg helmed this docudrama about the Deepwater Horizon disaster, the 2010 oil-rig explosion in the Gulf of Mexico that resulted in the largest offshore oil spill in U.S. history. The film depicts the challenges that Mike Williams (Mark Wahlberg) and the rest of the rig's crew faced as they fought for survival. Kate Hudson, Kurt Russell, and John Malkovich co-star(n)

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: Chaos reigns when a virus starts turning humans into blood-crazed predators. An alternate ending follows the film. Strong language/strong bloody violence/flashing images(n)

programme.title: The Box
programme.desc: Arthur and Norma Lewis receive a mysterious box that will grant them $1 million if they push the button inside, but they must debate if that's worth the consequence of killing a random person(n)

programme.title: Constantine
programme.desc: Supernatural action fantasy based on the cult comic book Hellblazer. An ordinary man who can see both good and evil spirits in human guise tries to kill himself when his ability becomes too much for him. But he is saved from death, and must atone for his actions by becoming a guardian who banishes earthbound demons to Hell. When he meets a policewoman investigating the suspicious death of her sister, they are drawn into a desperate bid to save all humanity from evil(n)

programme.title: Lights Out
programme.desc: A young woman (Teresa Palmer) must protect her brother (Gabriel Bateman) from a terrifying apparition that only manifests in total darkness. Later, she realizes that this fearsome entity is connected to her mentally ill mother (Maria Bello), who has started hallucinating conversations with a mysterious figure named Diana. Billy Burke and Alexander DiPersia co-star. Produced by James Wan (The Conjuring), Lights Out is a feature-length expansion of director David F. Sandberg's short film of the same name, which became a viral sensation online(n)

programme.title: Cursed
programme.desc: Following a werewolf attack, nerdy siblings Ellie and Jimmy enjoy the benefits of animal magnetism. It's fun for a while, but too many people are dying and time is running out for them to find the original beast, kill it and break the curse(n)

programme.title: Zoolander
programme.desc: Ben Stiller and Owen Wilson star in this outrageous cult comedy. An intellectually challenged male model finds himself involved in political espionage and assassination. Dir: Ben Stiller(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Based on a novel by Elleston Trevor, director John Moore's The Flight of the Phoenix is a remake of a 1965 film of the same name starring film icon James Stewart. The story revolves around the plight of Captain Frank Towns (Dennis Quaid), a pilot whose C-119 cargo plane full of oil workers could not withstand the violent winds of a desert sandstorm. Stranded in the harsh terrain of Mongolia's Gobi Desert (a departure from the original, in which the plane crashed in the Sahara), Frank and his navigator face an equal challenge in maintaining order among the survivors. The group of oilmen had planned on an uneventful trip to shut off a group of rigs falling below their productivity expectations -- not fending for their very lives. Before long, some men are revealed as cowards, while others exhibit a surprising show of strength, all the while hoping that the wreckage of the original plane can be salvaged before a Lord of the Flies situation occurs. Miranda Otto is featured in a supporting role, as well as Giovanni Ribisi and Tyrese Gibson(n)

programme.title: Never Die Alone
programme.desc: Rapper-turned-actor DMX is chilling in this intense account of the life and death of a violent drug kingpin. Flashbacks chronicle the life of King David (DMX), who turns out to be more like Goliath when he is knifed by a gangster's young henchman (Michael Ealy). David Arquette costars as an aspiring writer, who inherits audiotapes that detail all of King David's nasty business dealings. Clifton Powell(n)

programme.title: Tango & Cash
programme.desc: Ray Tango is a Los Angeles narcotics cop who dresses in fancy suits, wears wire-rim glasses, and talks to his stockbroker more than he talks to his mother. Gabriel Cash is another Los Angeles narcotics cop who has long, dishevelled blonde hair and dresses in worn-out sweatshirts. Together, Tango and Cash are the two best narcs in LA, which causes drug baron Yves Perret no end of distress(n)

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: In this harrowing historical drama set in the winter of 1820, the crew of the New England whaling ship the Essex struggle to survive after an attack by a rogue sperm whale leaves them stranded at sea for 90 days(n)

programme.title: Body of Lies
programme.desc: When idealistic CIA agent Roger Ferris is stationed in Jordan after being wounded in Iraq, he dedicates his life to stopping further attacks by Al Qaeda. Following a plan that the British employed successfully against the Nazis, Ferris plants the suspicion among the terrorists that their leaders are collaborating with the Americans. But as the stakes rise and Ferris finds himself in the crosshairs, the plot he starts spirals into an outcome he could never have foreseen(n)

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Tobey Maguire returns as the Webbed Wonder, battling evil in New York with Kirsten Dunst at his side(n)

programme.title: 12 Rounds
programme.desc: When a detective's fiancee is kidnapped by an ex-con, he must successfully complete 12 challenges in order to secure her safe release(n)

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: A sexy thriller about divers who find themselves battling sharks and ruthless criminals after discovering hidden treasure and a crashed plane loaded with cocaine(n)

programme.title: Alien: The Director's Cut
programme.desc: Revisit this sci-fi classic that made Sigourney Weaver one of the screen's most memorable heroines. This version of Ridley Scott's film features bonus footage and an enhanced soundtrack, which only adds to the suspense. It's the story of a monstrous alien that terrorizes the crew of a spaceship. Tom Skerritt, John Hurt, Ian Holm, Yaphet Kotto(n)

programme.title: Aliens
programme.desc: James Cameron took the helm for this equally frightening sequel, with Sigourney Weaver reprising her role as Ellen Ripley. Back on Earth, she is now safe but depressed until she's chosen to head a task force back to the planet where they first encountered the alien, now colonised by humans - with whom contact has been lost. This time, it's a whole hive of aliens who pick off the force one by one until it's just Ripley and young Newt, the sole surviving colonist, against the alien queen(n)

programme.title: Marauders
programme.desc: Following a brutal bank robbery, the bank owner and his clients became FBI's prime suspects. However, further investigations into the series of heists uncover a deeper conspiracy(n)

programme.title: D-Day to Victory
programme.desc: Breakout of Normandy. A German counterattack in Normandy attempts to divide the Allies, but British and Canadian forces hit hard in the north and American forces attack in the south to create the "Falaise Pocket."(n)

programme.title: D-Day to Victory
programme.sub-title: Battle for the Scheldt and Arnhem
programme.desc: Battle for the Scheldt and Arnhem. The Battle of the Scheldt is a victory for the Canadian 1st Army and opens the port of Antwerp for Allied supplies; while British forces fail in their attempt to break German defenses at Arnhem(n)

programme.title: D-Day to Victory
programme.desc: Battle of the Bulge. The Battle of the Bulge (December 1944-1945)(n)

programme.title: D-Day to Victory
programme.desc: Victory in Berlin. The war ends with the siege of Berlin(n)

programme.desc: Airplane to Air Force. The work of the Wright brothers, who eventually sold their creations to the U.S. military, is examined. Included: the influence of the rotary engine on propulsion; and the impact of flight on WWI, in which planes were used for reconnaissance and combat missions(n)

programme.title: Warplane

programme.title: Warplane

programme.desc: El Alamein. As the Nazis sweep all before them in Europe, the Anglo-Australian garrison in the small town of Tobruk in North Africa inspires the world by resisting the most celebrated German general of the Second World War(n)

programme.title: America: Facts vs. Fiction
programme.desc: Epic Inventions. Notable flying machines and important inventors are featured(n)

programme.title: America: Facts vs. Fiction
programme.desc: Tales of Sea and Sky. Exploits of notable seafarers and aviation pioneers are examined(n)

programme.title: America: Facts vs. Fiction
programme.desc: Engineering America. Myths about patriotic symbols are examined. Also: a look at the construction of the Panama Canal; and how the Transcontinental Railroad was built(n)

programme.title: America: Facts vs. Fiction
programme.desc: All-American Landmarks. Notable U.S. landmarks are spotlighted(n)

programme.title: America: Facts vs. Fiction
programme.desc: Vote for the Truth. Profiles of U.S. generals, including Dwight Eisenhower and Douglas MacArthur. Also: a look at Washington, D.C., landmarks(n)

programme.title: Weaponology
programme.desc: Body Armor. Dragon skin uses ballistic fibres to flex and mould armour to the body. Explore the history of body armour and the technological innovations that have transformed it(n)

programme.title: Weaponology
programme.desc: Frags, Pineapples, and RPG's. Different types of grenades are examined(n)

programme.title: Weaponology
programme.desc: Tanks. They boast a deadly mix of speed, protection and power: now experts trace the tank's historic tracks - from lumbering steel box to a beast of the battlefield, the M1 Abrams(n)

programme.title: Weaponology
programme.desc: US Marine Corps. In the air, on land, at sea - the United States Marine Corps is the ultimate combined arms unit. Weaponology uncovers the Corps' evolution(n)

programme.desc: Waffen SS. Examining the Waffen SS, Nazi Germany's elite soldiers, armed with the most advanced weapons and unrivaled fanaticism(n)

programme.title: Weaponology
programme.desc: US Army Airborne. 'Weaponology' unravels the mysteries of a multitude of weaponry and arms, both archaic and contemporary. The metamorphosis of America's auspicious US Airborne is examined(n)

programme.title: The World at War
programme.desc: A New Germany (1933-1939). Laurence Olivier narrates the acclaimed documentary series. Stricken by the humiliation of defeat, Germany looks to Adolf Hitler for a resurgence of hope(n)

programme.title: The World at War
programme.desc: Distant War (September 1939 - May 1940). With Laurence Olivier. Laurence Olivier narrates the acclaimed documentary series telling the story of World War II. For months after Prime Minister Chamberlain's declaration of war, the only casualties suffered in Britain by the home front are on the streets during black-out. In other parts of Europe, the full force of the Nazi war machine rolls on(n)

programme.title: The World at War
programme.desc: France Falls (May - June 1940). This video is part three in the 26-volume World at War series that chronicles the history of World War II. These historic television broadcasts originally appeared on Sunday evenings in 1974. This episode follows the advance of Hitler's army into France in May and June of 1940, and its frightening march into Paris. England stood alone in Europe against the German army. Meanwhile, Russian troops were occupying Poland and the Balkan states(n)

programme.title: The World at War
programme.desc: Alone (May 1940 - May 1941). After Dunkirk, Britain faces an onslaught. Although the RAF wins the Battle of Britain, cities are blitzed. Narrated by Laurence Olivier(n)

programme.title: World War II: Confidential
programme.desc: Unlikely Friends. The backroom dealings of Winston Churchill, Franklin D. Roosevelt and Joseph Stalin during WWII are explored in this series, which begins with the Nazi-Soviet Pact of 1939 and Germany's termination of it with Operation Barbarossa in June 1941(n)

programme.title: World War II: Confidential
programme.desc: Hitler's Betrayal. Soviet-British relations; the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor; and plans for a Western Front in Europe are examined(n)

programme.title: River Monsters
programme.desc: Killer Torpedo. Extreme angler Jeremy Wade ventures deep into Central America in search of a killer fish which is said to leap into boats and cause fatal injuries. Believed to reach eight feet in length and weighing up to 300 pounds, it instils fear in all who encounter it. Jeremy has to relearn everything he knows about fishing to attempt to catch this deadly creature. Will he be successful in hunting it down?(n)
